About universAAL UI Framework

The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL User Interaction Management framework.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
universAAL UI Dialog Manager 2.0 The component providing the universAAL system menu, handling context-free user input, and managing system reactivity.
universAAL UI Resource Server Resource server for UI Handlers. Exposes resources stored in configurations/handlerResources folder via HTTP
universAAL UI Handler Swing Swing based GUI Handler
universAAL UI Handler Swing Look and Feel Bluesteel The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL User Interaction Management framework.
universAAL UI Handler Swing Look and Feel Classic The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL User Interaction Management framework.
universAAL UI HTML5 Web Handler The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL User Interaction Management framework.
universAAL UI Handler SMS UI Handler that sends application output as SMS
universAAL UI Internationalization Utility The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL User Interaction Management framework.
universAAL UI kinect adapter An adapter for non universAAL devices.
universAAL UI kinect adapter instance An adapter for non universAAL devices.
universAAL UI Karaf Feature The set of artefacts realizing the universAAL User Interaction Management framework.
